narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Human Care Llc. is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $59.7M in Medicaid payments across 416K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $59.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
